billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Grants James Ryan retirement service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
summary: Grants James Ryan retirement service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system for services provided to the Long Island Rail Road beginning in 1978.
actClause: AN ACT to grant James Ryan retirement service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
